page.title: 07RECREATIONS.RELIGION.TOURISM
page.content: Recreations are gardening,television, radio,football,darts,cricket,rugby, fishing,snooker,walking,knitting,shoot ing,horse-riding,swimming,arts and crafts,Point to Point racing, etc. There is a football piich at Colla- combe Down, but all other activities take place outside the area. Relgion is served by a C of E church and a Methodist chapel at Sydenham. Two parishes are Sydenham Damerel and Lamerton (second largest in England). Other denominations have to travel considerable distance to worship. C of E church is linked with 3 others, the incumbent travelling. POpulation is not generally church going, except for Harvest Festival and Christmas. Tourism has little or no affect. One seasonal caravan site, increased summer traffic.
